description:
The purpose of SponB is to enable individuals and groups to enjoy sports through block-chain-based SponB platform to improve individual performance through reliable match management, transparent and effective community management. We aim to revitalize the ecosystem by providing new business opportunities for partners (sports brands, facilities) by providing a stable payment system and rewards.


Made up of top sport and IT experts, SponB will offer a system that helps to select members of the team and recommend suitable players for the user based on various personal activity data (competition history data, used sports goods and facilities, user reviews). SponB’s network will provide the functions that enable quick and easy sports activities including a unique opportunity for all participants in the network to get various rewards from network activation through participation.
name: SPONB
